wikipedia_page.main: Jon Jon Park (born 21 February 1957) is a British former swimmer. He competed in the men's 100 metre butterfly at the 1976 Summer Olympics. He also won several bodybuilding titles, including Mr. South Africa Maccabiah and Mr. Golden City.He was born in Johannesburg, South Africa; his father is former Mr. Universe Reg Park.
